featuresList.title: Slicing Mode:
items: Box Mode: Supports auto-detection and creating selection boxes by dragging the mouse. Create, move, and resize selection boxes anywhere. Hold down the Shift key to maintain the aspect ratio when resizing.
Grid Mode: Quickly perform uniform grid slicing by defining a scalable grid area and the number of rows and columns.

featuresList.title: Editing Operations: Supports selecting, moving, and deleting selection boxes, and resizing via 8 anchor points.
Canvas Control: Supports canvas scaling and global margin adjustment.
Hotkeys: Supports common function hotkeys
items: Delete: Use the Delete or Backspace key to delete the selected box.
Fine-tuning: Use the ↑ ↓ ← → arrow keys to fine-tune the position of the selection box (1px). Hold down the Shift key for quick fine-tuning (10px).

featuresList.title: Export Function: One-click packaging of all images within the selection boxes into a .zip compressed file for download. Supports custom prefixes and connectors for exported filenames.
